description:
Gauda, Itami Karura returns from the abyss. Born before Takashi, Shusuke, and Hayato, he is the only man Otori Kakeru has ever fallen for. When he finally sees Karura again, Kakeru`s excitement reaches its peak. The terrible king`s Christmas party turns into a frenzy in the crowded streets of Yanagihara.
Source: crunchyroll
